title: LLM Model Capabilities Configuration
description: A configuration file defining the capabilities of various models for different providers.

$schema.description: A reference to the schema used to validate this file.

^(?!\\$schema$)[a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Holds the configuration for a specific provider (e.g., 'ollama', 'openai').

models.description: A list of specific models and their capabilities.

name.description: The unique identifier for the model (e.g., 'gemma3:latest', 'gpt-4o-mini').

contextSize.description: The maximum context window size in tokens.

supportsTools.description: Indicates if the model supports tool calling (function calling).

supportsThinking.description: Indicates if the model supports an internal 'thinking' or 'reasoning' step.

supportsInputImage.description: Indicates if the model can process image inputs (multimodal).
